result.title: Techno-commercial Pharma case studies
result.description: During the performance verification testing in pharma industrial environments, some companies will already access direct experience in implementing ColVisTec's multi-spectra platform in their manufacturing process. These Pharma end users’ validations will be properly documented and presented under the suitable format of Techno-commercial Pharma Case Studies. Confidential information contained in the reports will be kept protected and private for disclosing these case studies to a wider public and enabling their potential support as reliable proofs in the commercialization phase.
